import React,{useContext} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' function Filter() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [sort, setSort] = state.customerAPI.sort const [city, setCity] = state.customerAPI.city const [Id, setId] = state.customerAPI.Id return (
Sort By
City
setCity(e.target.value.toLowerCase())} />
User Id
setId(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Filter
